description: Number of Fibonacci numbers 1,2,3,5,... dividing n.
comments: a(n) <= A072649(n). - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 10 2006Indices of records are in A129655. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 02 2007
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Equals A051731 * A010056. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 06 2007G.f.: sum_{n>=2} x^F(n)/(1-x^F(n)) where F(n)=A000045(n). - _Joerg Arndt_, Jan 06 2015
maple: with(combinat): for n from 1 to 200 do printf(`%d,`,sum(floor(n/fibonacci(k))-floor((n-1)/fibonacci(k)), k=2..15)) od:
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1}, While[Fibonacci[k] <= n, k++ ]; Count[ Mod[n, Array[ Fibonacci, k - 1]], 0] - 1]; Array[f, 105] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 10 2006 *)
prog: (PARI) isfib(n)=my(k=n^2); k+=(k+1)<<2; issquare(k) || (n>0 && issquare(k-8))a(n)=sumdiv(n,d,isfib(d)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 06 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 19 2001
Incorrect comment removed by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 06 2014
